const newHistory=designHistory.slice(0,historyIndex+1);newHistory.push(newDesign);// Limit history to 50 items
if(newHistory.length>50){newHistory.shift();}else{setHistoryIndex(historyIndex+1);}setDesignHistory(newHistory);setPassDesign(newDesign);};const handleUndo=useCallback(()=>{if(historyIndex>0){const newIndex=historyIndex-1;setHistoryIndex(newIndex);setPassDesign(designHistory[newIndex]);}},[historyIndex,designHistory]);const handleRedo=useCallback(()=>{if(historyIndex<designHistory.length-1){const newIndex=historyIndex+1;setHistoryIndex(newIndex);setPassDesign(designHistory[newIndex]);}},[historyIndex,designHistory]);const handleReset=()=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to reset to default?
